name: pawn-painter
description: Colour picker for open.mp and SA-MP

pawnpainter.general.enableColorPicker.description: Enable the VS Code colour picker for all supported colour formats. This allows you to use the built-in colour picker to modify colours in your code.

pawnpainter.hex.enabled.description: Enable highlighting for hexadecimal colour codes (0xRRGGBB, 0xRRGGBBAA, {RRGGBB}).

enumDescriptions: Color the text directly with the specified colour
Show a coloured underline below the hex colour code
Show a coloured background behind the hex colour code
pawnpainter.hex.style.description: Choose how hex colour codes should be highlighted in your code

pawnpainter.hex.showAlphaWarnings.description: Show warning hints when a colour has an alpha value of 00. This can help identify potentially unintended transparent colours.

pawnpainter.gameText.enabled.description: Enable colour preview for GameText colour codes (~r~, ~g~, ~b~, etc.). Supports brightness modifiers (~h~) for enhanced colours.

enumDescriptions: Color the text directly with the specified colour
Show a coloured underline below the text
Show a coloured background behind the text
pawnpainter.gameText.style.description: Choose how GameText colours should be displayed in your code

pawnpainter.inlineText.enabled.description: Enable colour highlighting for text between colour tags (e.g., '{FF0000}red text, {FFFFFF}white text'). This helps visualize coloured text.

enumDescriptions: Color the text directly with the specified colour
Show a coloured underline below the text
Show a coloured background behind the text
pawnpainter.inlineText.style.description: Choose how inline coloured text should be displayed in your code
